translations: v．立法，制定法律：通过立法机构制定或修改法律。
· The government legislates on various issues.
政府对各种问题进行立法。

sentences.sentence: The most severe question was legislates the quality was not high, which has harmed the legal system authority, and has affected the actual effect of the legislative work.
sentences.translation: 最突出的问题是立法质量不高，损害了法制的权威，影响了法制建设的实际效果。

sentences.sentence: In view of this, some countries or areas have already introduced the public interests principle in the anti-dumping legislates and some countries or areas are considering it.
sentences.translation: 鉴于此，有些国家或地区已经或正在考虑将公共利益原则引入反倾销立法中。

sentences.sentence: The six part compared with and analysed the well-known mark law relief means of the various countries and analyse the deficiency that our country legislates and have proposed improving the suggestion.
sentences.translation: 本文的第六部分对比了各国的驰名商标保护的法律救济手段，分析了我国立法的不足，提出了改进建议。
